title: Mini-Ep 234: The Shampurest Love
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 234: The Shampurest Love
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree soothe their worries from the world with a conversation about all things Aveda, lazy skincare days, and how to handle the phrase, “Sorry for your loss." - To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0...
description:
Kate and Doree soothe their worries from the world with a conversation about all things Aveda, lazy skincare days, and how to handle the phrase, “Sorry for your loss."


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
